item.title: Laura add a quote by Jennifer Crusie
item.description: "If you can't be a good example, you'll just have to be a horrible warning." -Gwen Goodnight" -- Jennifer Crusie

item.title: Laura add a quote by Joe Queenan
item.description: "Because to the poor, books are not diversions. Book are siege weapons." -- Joe Queenan

item.title: Laura add a quote by Joe Queenan
item.description: "Saddling another person with a book he did not ask for has always seemed to me like a huge psychological imposition, like forcing someone to eat a chicken biryani without so much as inquiring whether they like cilantro." -- Joe Queenan

item.title: Laura add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Laura add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "It's never too late to have a happy childhood." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Laura add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Laura add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Laura add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Laura add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Laura add a quote by Berkeley Breathed
item.description: "Liberal, shmiberal. That should be a new word. Shmiberal: one who is assumed liberal, just because he's a professional whiner in the newspaper. If you'll read the subtext for many of those old strips, you'll find the heart of an old-fashioned Libertarian. And I'd be a Libertarian, if they weren't all a bunch of tax-dodging professional whiners." -- Berkeley Breathed

item.title: Laura add a quote by Berkeley Breathed
item.description: "I will go to my grave in a state of abject endless fascination that we all have the capacity to become emotionally involved with a personality that doesn't exist." -- Berkeley Breathed

item.title: Laura add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Laura add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Laura add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Laura add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Laura add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Laura add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Laura add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Laura add a quote by Mary Ann Shaffer
item.description: "I don't want to be married just to be married. I can't think of anything lonelier than spending the rest of my life with someone I can't talk to, or worse, someone I can't be silent with." -- Mary Ann Shaffer

item.title: Laura add a quote by Mary Ann Shaffer
item.description: "That's what I love about reading: one tiny thing will interest you in a book, and that tiny thing will lead you to another book, and another bit there will lead you onto a third book. It's geometrically progressive - all with no end in sight, and for no other reason than sheer enjoyment." -- Mary Ann Shaffer

item.title: Laura add a quote by Mary Ann Shaffer
item.description: "Reading good books ruins you for enjoying bad books." -- Mary Ann Shaffer

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching -- they are your family. " -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "Paranoid? Probably. But just because you're paranoid doesn't mean there isn't an invisible demon about to eat your face." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description:
"Are you always a smartass?'
Nope. Sometimes I'm asleep." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "Life is a journey. Time is a river. The door is ajar" -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "I had to smile at the man. I mean, you have to smile at idiots and children." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "Of course Evil's afoot. If it had switched to the metric system it'd be up to a meter by now. " -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "Laugh whenever you can. Keeps you from killing yourself when things are bad. That and vodka." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "An <i>errand</i> is getting a tank of gas or picking up a carton of milk or something. It is <i>not</i> getting chased by flying purple pyromaniac gorillas hurling incendiary poo!" -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "In the name of the Pizza Lord. Charge!" -- Jim Butcher
